project_description: Developed a comprehensive online academic weblog platform to facilitate the sharing of scholarly articles,research papers, and academic discussionsamong students, professors, and general users. The platform included user authentication, article management, complaints management, usermanagement, and system configuration.
keyResponsibilities: Designed and developed a responsive user interface using Next.js and TypeScript
Created components optimized for SSR, CSR, and SSG for SEO
Utilized Mantine React Library for modern, consistent UI components
Styled the interface with Tailwind CSS for a beautiful and modern design
Designed a clean and user-friendly interface
technologies_used: Next.js, Typescript, Tailwind CSS, Zustand, Mantine, TinyMCE
